column6: Nova's United Front is divided. Nova sets off on a desperate mission. Ronan heads to Hala to free the Kree race. And everyone else is just trying to survive! And what's Drax's secret agenda, anyway?
column8: | penciller (cover):Gabriele Dell'Otto | writer:Keith Giffen | letterer:Cory Petit | colorist:Laura Villari | penciller:Andrea Di Vito
